title: Textile, ca. 1740
medium:
Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk-core threads of three types
Technique: warp-faced plain weave ground with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Length of white silk brocaded with three types of gold metallic treads, with large C-shaped curves with exotic leaves and flowers.

exhibitions.title: The Huguenot Legacy: English Silver, 1680-1760 from the Alan & Simone Hartman Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1740.
ca. 1740. Medium: silk, metal-wrapped silk-core threads of three types
Technique: warp-faced plain weave ground with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade). Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1990-150-2.
